about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Mafia Trends Limited is engaged in the business of marketing and selling Men's fashion which includes apparel such as Jeans, Tshirts, Shirts, Chinos, Formal trousers and Formal shirts.

Mafia is a fashion brand that provides affordable outfits yet premium. The company's business is based on the primary concept of 'Value Retailing' following which the company aim to provide the latest fashion trends in apparel and non-apparels for men with an added focus on the demands of the youth and young generation.

The total revenue for 2020-21 is Rs 400.80 lacs and for April 01, 2021 to January 31, 2022 is Rs 620.16 lacs.

Competitive Strengths :

  • First mover advantage in Tier-II and Tier-III cities and to target the expanding, aspiring class and middle-class customer group.
  • Competitive lease rentals.
  • Strong and diversified procurement network.
  • Efficient supply chain management.
  • Value Addition to our products
  • Strong IT infrastructure, systems and processes
  • One-stop shop with a large variety of products, adopting store Concept Classification, customised for the local populace.

faqs.question: What is the Mafia Trends IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mafia Trends IPO is a SME IPO of 1284000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹28 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 22, 2022, and closes on September 27, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mafia Trends IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mafia Trends IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mafia Trends IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mafia Trends IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mafia Trends IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mafia Trends IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mafia Trends IPO opens on September 22, 2022 and closes on September 27, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mafia Trends IPO?
faqs.answer: Mafia Trends IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mafia Trends IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mafia Trends IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Mafia Trends IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Mafia Trends IPO will be done on Friday, September 30, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 4, 2022. Check the Mafia Trends IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Mafia Trends IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Mafia Trends IPO listing date is on Thursday, October 6, 2022.
